message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies our respective interests. Considering its worth to you, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer not only reflects the product's true value but also provides a reasonable profit margin for me. I look forward to discussing this further and hope to hear your thoughts soon.
